name: MicroCoin
description: THE FIRST HUNGARIAN CRYPTOCURRENCY MicroCoin is a peer-to-peer Internet currency that enables instant, near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world. Developed for real world applications! MicroCoin was developed for real world applications. The whole project is free and Open Source. You can use it for free or modify anything what you want. Feel free to join us, or get started with our Wallet. Not premined MicroCoin was a 100% fair launch without any pre-mine, ICO or investment rounds. Fast MicroCoin network can execute 70000 transactions in one second. It can be safely used for micropayments and real applications. Safe Because the unique technology, MicroCoin is the one of the safest cryptocurrency in the world. Simple MicroCoin offers simple account numbers, what easy to remember. The wallet has easy to use interface, you can use it without any IT knowledge
